messages.message:
@Varun Jain Am I right in understanding that we can run long documents through Chat and Build now?

I just tried running chat on a 53 page document and it shows “Processing query” for a second, then populates the search box with my question again and doesn’t answer it.

@Timo Meijrink we haven’t introduced the large docs processing the existing gtm sandbox yet. If this is important for a lot of SEs, I can check with the team if there is a simple way to do it.

The active implementation is going on a new preview environment for AI hub, which includes large docs processing. We will roll out this preview release to all the IB users over next few weeks. Currently, it is being tested by a small group of users.
Ahh okay clear, is it possible for me to get an account on this preview release to test on local language annual reports?

Also, interestingly enough I am seeing the same behaviour with the first question in this screenshot (it says processing query for a second and then populates the field with my question again without answering it). In the second question I removed the “3. ” from the question and it worked?
very interested also to see the limit extended on the GTM sandbox, have been limited for several demos already
including for a demo at axa france next week
